snippet: The captain of Brazil’s 2006 FIFA Club World Cup champions, Fernando Lúcio da Costa, better known as Fernandão, died early Saturday in a helicopter crash, his former team said.
lead_paragraph: The captain of Brazil’s 2006 FIFA Club World Cup champions, Fernando Lúcio da Costa, better known as Fernandão, died early Saturday in a helicopter crash, his former team said.

headline.main: Helicopter Crash Kills Former Brazilian Star
headline.print_headline: Helicopter Crash Kills Former Brazilian Star
